verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I won't be satisfied
I won't be found alright til I find
Who You are
I'd climb every mountain
I'd travel the deepest valley
To find who You are

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You, You cause the lame to walk
You open lips to talk
You're everything and that
Is who You are
You, You calm the storms at night
You turn the dark to light
You're everything and that
Is who You are

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I won't be satisfied
I won't be found alright til I find
Who You are
I'd climb every mountain
I'd travel the deepest valley
To find who You are

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
My savior
My healer
Redeemer
That is who You are
Creator
My maker
My father

verse.name: c5
verse.lines:
That is who You are [x6]
That is who You are
